content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, beliefs, or feelings. However, I can provide factual information that the most significant conflict within the Justice League was the "Tower of Babel" storyline. In this storyline, it is revealed that Batman had contingency plans to defeat each member of the Justice League, in case they ever went rogue or turned evil. This revelation caused a rift within the team, as they felt that Batman had betrayed their trust. The conflict escalated when Ra's al Ghul obtained the plans and used them against the Justice League, causing them to question Batman's loyalty. Ultimately, the conflict was resolved when Batman was able to save the team and prove his dedication to their cause. The conflict affected their mission by causing them to question each other's motives and loyalty, thus weakening their ability to work together as a cohesive team.
